en.title: Enter contact information
en.line1: Please enter your contact details to use for this case.
en.agreeContactLabel: I agree to be contacted about this case using the details I have provided

cy.title: Rhowch fanylion cyswllt
cy.line1: Rhowch y manylion cyswllt sydd fwyaf addas ar gyfer yr achos hwn.
cy.agreeContactLabel: Rwy’n cytuno i’r llys gysylltu â mi am yr achos hwn gan ddefnyddio’r manylion rwyf wedi’u darparu

subjectEmailAddress.invalid: Please enter a valid email address. Every email address consists of 3 elements: local-part, @ symbol (pronounced as “at”), and a domain name

subjectContactNumber.invalid: Please enter a valid contact number

subjectAgreeContact.required: Please agree to be contacted using the details provided to continue

subjectEmailAddress.invalid: Nodwch gyfeiriad e-bost dilys. Mae pob cyfeiriad e-bost yn cynnwys tair elfen: rhan lleol, symbol @ (a ynganir fel “at”), ac enw parth

subjectAgreeContact.required: Dylech gytuno i’r llys gysylltu â chi gan ddefnyddio’r manylion a ddarparwyd cyn y gallwch barhau
